inputs.name: character set server
inputs.description: --character-set-server - The character set of MySQL server

inputs.name: collation server
inputs.description: --collation-server - The character collation of MySQL server

inputs.name: mysql database
inputs.description: MYSQL_DATABASE - name for the default database that is created

inputs.name: mysql user
inputs.description: MYSQL_USER - create the specified user with superuser power for created database

inputs.name: mysql password
inputs.description: MYSQL_PASSWORD - specified superuser password which user is power for created database

inputs.name: authentication plugin
inputs.description: Set authentication plugin. Login/password is used as default. Changes default behaviour of MySQL 8.0+, where `caching_sha2_password` is a default value.

inputs.name: use tmpfs
inputs.description: Whether or not to use Docker's tmpfs feature for MySQL's storage
